name: Atari ST Program
summary: Learn about .ACX files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Atari introduced the Atari ST line in 1985 and released several ST models, including 520ST and 1040ST. However, Atari discontinued the Atari ST line in 1993.

Retro computing enthusiasts utilize emulation software to run applications and play games on their modern computers. For example, a nostalgic computer user who enjoyed the Atari 1040ST computer from 1986 may install the Gemulator on their application to run a game saved as an ACX file.

instructions: You can open an ACX file with various Atari ST emulators and run the program it contains. Atari ST emulators that support ACX files include Gemulator (Windows), Hatari (multiplatform), and PaCifiST (Windows).

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
